steps: Whisk together the ['ing']{Crushed graham crackers}, the ['ing']{White sugar}, ['ing']{Ground cinnamon}. Stir in the ['ing']{Melted butter}. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 8 inch springform pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Remove from oven; allow crust to cool.
Beat the ['ing']{Cream cheese} with the ['ing']{Medium eggs} on medium-low with an electric mixer until smooth.
Beat in the ['ing']{Sugar} and ['ing']{Vanilla extract}. Fold in the ['ing']{Sour cream} just until blended. Do not overmix; overmixing causes the cheesecake to crack. Pour into the cooled crust.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Turn oven off. When the cheesecake has reached room temperature, chill in refrigerator for 8 hours before serving.
